issue.title: [C++][R] Lint failing on R cpp code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6701](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6701). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[See as an example https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/589772132#L695](https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/589772132#L695)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6701?focusedCommentId=16938715) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This seems to be passing on master now; was it already fixed? <https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/589914595>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6701?focusedCommentId=16938716) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
The strange thing is I don't think it ever failed on master.  I only discovered it when creating release branches.  It might be an issue with sliding past CI at some point and no-one has touched the file?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6701?focusedCommentId=16938719) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
¯\_(ツ)_/¯ I'll try to reproduce and fix locally

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6701?focusedCommentId=16938723) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
thanks downgrading from blocker since it doesn't seem to actually happening on master and isn't blocking the release.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6701?focusedCommentId=16939745) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5514
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5514>
